targetString: Virusi hivi na vingine vya popo vya CoV huwa na msururu 88-92% unaofanana wa nukleotidi ulio na SARS-CoV.

sourceString: These studies have laid the foundation for the new concept that bats host emerging human pathogens.
targetString: Utafiti huu umeweka msingi wa dhana mpya kwamba popo hubeba virusi vinavyoibuka vya binadamu.

sourceString: Several SARS-like CoVs (SL-CoVs) have also been identified from bats, but none except for one designated WIV1 can be isolated as live virus.
targetString: Virusi kadhaa vya Cov (SL-CoVs) vinavyofanana na SARS pia vimetambuliwa kwenye popo, lakini hakuna kati yavyo isipokuwa WIV1 vinavyoweza kutengwa kama virusi hai.

sourceString: Human angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is known to be the receptor of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Homoni ya binadamu inayosababisha shinikizo la damu inayobadilisha enzaimu 2 (ACE2) inafahamika kuwa kipokezi cha SARS-CoV.

sourceString: WIV1 derived from fecal sample of bats was demonstrated to use bat, civet and human ACE2 as receptor for cell entry.
targetString: Virusi vya WIV1 viliyotolewa kwenye sampuli ya kinyesi ya popo vilionyeshwa kutumia popo, ngawa na ACE2 ya binadamu kama kipokezi cha kuingia kwenye seli.

sourceString: Intriguingly, sera of convalescent SARS patients were capable of neutralizing WIV1.
targetString: Cha kushangaza, seramu kutoka wagonjwa wanaopona wa SARS ziliweza kuangamiza WIV1.

sourceString: Thus far, WIV1 represents the most closely related ancestor of SARS-CoV in bats, sharing 95% nucleotide sequence homology.
targetString: Kufikia sasa, virusi vya WIV1 vinawakilisha kizazi cha karibu sana cha SARS-CoV kwenye popo, vikiwa na 95% za msururu wa nukleotidi unaofanana.

sourceString: Albeit the high homology between these two viruses, it is generally believed that WIV1 is not the immediate parental virus of SARS-CoV and bats are not the immediate reservoir host of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Kwa mfanano mkubwa kati ya virusi hivi, inaaminika kwa jumla kwamba WIV1 si virusi vizalishaji vya kati vya SARS-CoV na popo sio wabebaji wa kati wanaohifadhi SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis clusters MERS-CoV to the same group as bat CoV-HKU4 and bat CoV-HKU5.
targetString: Uchanganuzi wa kifilogenetiki unaweka pamoja MERS-CoV kwenye kikundi sawa na virusi vya CoV-HKU4 vya popo na virusi vya CoV-HKU5 vya popo.

sourceString: Bat CoV-HKU4 and MERS-CoV utilize the same host receptor, dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4), for virus entry.
targetString: Virusi vya CoV-HKU4 vya popo na MERS-CoV hutumia vipokezi sawa vya mbebaji, dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4), kwa ajili ya kuingia kwa virusi.

sourceString: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase sequences of MERS-CoV are phylogenetically closer to counterparts in bat beta-CoVs identified from Europe and Africa.
targetString: Misururu ya RNA- tegemezi ya polimerisi ya RNA ya MERS-CoV inakaribia kufanana kifilojenetiki na iliyo ndani ya virusi vya beta-CoV vya popo vilivyotambuliwa barani Ulaya na Afrika.

sourceString: Up to now, no live MERS-CoV can be found in wild bats.
targetString: Kufikia sasa, hakuna virusi hai vya MERS-COV vinavyoweza kupatikana ndani ya popo wa porini.

sourceString: MERS-CoV and its closest relative bat CoV-HKU25 share only 87% nucleotide sequence homology.
targetString: MERS-CoV na jamii yake ya karibu zaidi ya virusi vya CoV-HKU25 vya popo vina mfanano wa 87% tu wa msururu wa nukleotidi.

sourceString: Thus, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: Kwa hivyo, popo huenda wasiwe wabebaji wa kati wahifadhi wa MERS-CoV.

sourceString: On the other hand, studies in Middle East have shown that dromedary camels are seropositive for MERS-CoV-specific neutralizing antibodies, same as camels of Middle East origin in multiple African countries.
targetString: Kwa upande mwingine, utafiti uliofanywa Mashariki ya Kati umeonyesha kwamba ngamia warefu zaidi kuwa na antibodi mahususi ya kusawazisha MERS-CoV, sawa na ngamia wa asili ya Mashariki ya Kati walio katika nchi nyingi za Afrika.

sourceString: Live MERS-CoV identical to the virus found in humans was isolated from the nasal swabs of dromedary camels, further indicating that camels serve as the bona fide reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: Virusi hai vya MERS-CoV vinavyofanana na virusi vinavyopatikana katika binadamu vilitolewa kutoka kwa sampuli za puani kutoka kwa ngamia warefu zaidi, na kuashiria zaidi kwamba ngamia wanaweza kutumika kama wabebaji wahifadhi wa kweli wa virusi vya MERS-CoV.

sourceString: It is also noteworthy that generally mild symptoms but massive virus shedding were observed in camels experimentally infected with MERS-CoV.
targetString: Pia ni muhimu kukumbuka kwamba kwa kawaida dalili kiasi lakini zilizo na utoaji wa virusi kwa wingi kwa jumla zilionekana kwa ngamia walioambukizwa MERS-CoV kwa ajili ya majaribio.

sourceString: Notably, infected camels shed viruses not only through respiratory route but also through fecal-oral route, which is also the main route for virus shedding from bats.
targetString: Ni dhahiri kwamba, ngamia walioambukizwa hutoa virusi sio tu kupitia njia ya kupumua lakini pia kupitia kinyesi, ambayo pia ni njia kuu ya kutoa virusi kutoka kwa popo.

sourceString: However, questions still remain since many confirmed cases of MERS have no contact history with camels prior to symptom onset, plausibly ascribed to human-to-human transmission or unknown transmission routes involving unrecognized animal species that harbour MERS-CoV.
targetString: Hata hivyo, maswali bado hayajajibiwa kwa kuwa visa vingi vya watu waliothibitishwa kuwa na MERS hawana historia ya kutangamana na ngamia kabla ya kuanza kwa dalili, na kuashiria pakubwa maambukizi ya binadamu hadi kwa binadamu au njia zisizojulikana za usambazaji zinazohusisha aina za wanyama ambao hawajatambuliwa wanaobeba MERS-CoV.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 shares 96.2% nucleotide homology with a bat CoV RaTG13 isolated from Rhinolophus affinis bats.
targetString: Virusi vya SARS-CoV-2 vina 96.2% za nukleotidi zinazofanana na virusi vya CoV RaTG13 vya popo vilivyotolewa kwa popo wa asili ya Rhinolophus affinis.

sourceString: As in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is too great to assign parental relationship.
targetString: Kama ilivyo katika visa vya SARS-CoV na MERS-CoV, tofauti za msururu kati ya SARS-CoV-2 na RaTG13 ni kubwa zaidi hivyo haviwezi vikawekewa uhusiano wa kiuzazi.

sourceString: That is to say, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host(s) of SARS-CoV-2 unless almost identical bat CoVs are found in future.
targetString: Hiyo ni kusema kwamba, popo huenda sio wabebaji wa karibu wahifadhi wa SARS-CoV-2 isipokuwa iwapo virusi vya CoV vya popo vinavyokaribia kufanana vitapatikana katika siku zijazo.

sourceString: Presumably, the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2 should be among the wildlife species sold and killed at the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, with which many of the initial cases of COVID-19 were associated, indicative of a probable animal-to-human transmission event.
targetString: Inaweza kuchukuliwa kwamba, mnyama mbebaji wa kati wa SARS-CoV-2 anapaswa kuwa miongoni mwa aina ya wanyama wa porini wanaouzwa na kuuawa katika Soko la Jumla la Huanan Seafood, ambapo visa vingi vya kwanza vya COVID-19 vilihusishwa, ikiashiria uwezekano wa tukio la usambazaji kutoka kwa mnyama hadi kwa binadamu.

sourceString: Several recent studies based on metagenomic sequencing have suggested that a group of endangered small mammals known as pangolins (Manis javanica) could also harbour ancestral beta-CoVs related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Tafiti nyingi za hivi majuzi zenye unaozingatia misururu ya kimetagenomiki imeashiria kwamba kikundi cha mamalia wadogo walio hatarini wanaojulikana kama kakakuona (Manis javanica) wanaweza kubeba virusi vya jadi vya beta-CoV vinavyohusiana na SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: These novel pangolin CoV genomes share 85-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Jinomeu hizi za CoV kutoka kwa kakakuona zina 85-92% ya msururu wa homolojia ya nukleotidi sawa na virusi vya SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: However, they are equally closely related to RaTG13 with about 90% identity at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: Hata hivyo, pia vinahusiana kwa njia sawa kwa karibu na RaTG13 kwa takriban 90% ya utambulisho katika ngazi ya mfululizo wa nukleotidi.

sourceString: They cluster into two sub-lineages of SARS-CoV-2-like viruses in the phylogenetic tree, one of which share a more similar receptor binding domain (RBD) with SARS-CoV-2, with 97.4% amino acid sequence identity.
targetString: Hupangwa katika jamii mbili ndogo za virusi vinavyofanana na SARS-CoV-2 katika mchoro wa kifilogenetiki, moja yao ikiwa inashiriki kikoa sawa kipokezi cha kunata (RBD) sawa na SARS-CoV-2, kilicho na 97.4% ya mfululizo wa utambuzi wa asidi amino.

sourceString: In stark contrast, the RBDs of SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 are more divergent, albeit a higher degree of sequence homology genome-wide.
targetString: Katika ulinganisho ulio wazi, RBD za virusi vya SARS-CoV-2 na RaTG13 ni tofauti kabisa, ijapokuwa kiwango kikubwa cha upana wa msururu wa jinomu inayofana.

sourceString: An earlier study on diseased pangolins also reported the detection of viral contigs from lung samples, which turn out to be similarly related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Utafiti wa awali kwenye kakakuona waliokuwa wagonjwa pia uliripoti kugunduliwa kwa virusi katika sampuli za figo ambavyo, vilitokea kuwa na uhusiano na SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: This study adopted different assembly methods and manual curation to generate a partial genome sequence comprising about 86.3% of the full-length viral genome.
targetString: Utafiti huu ulitumia mbinu tofauti za ukusanyaji na urekebishaji ili kuzalisha msururu nusu wa jinomu ulio na 86.3% ya urefu kamili wa jinomu ya virusi.

sourceString: We cannot exclude the possibility that pangolin is one of the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Hatuwezi kufungia nje uwezekano kwamba kakakuona ni mmoja wa wanyama wabebaji wa kati wa SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: However, currently there is no evidence in support of a direct pangolin origin of SARS-CoV-2 due to the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs.
targetString: Hata hivyo, kwa sasa hakuna ushahidi wa kuunga mkono asili ya moja kwa moja ya kakakuona ya SARS-CoV-2 kutokana na tofauti za msururu kati ya virusi vya SARS-CoV-2 na virusi vya beta-CoVs vinavyohusiana na SARS-CoV-2 ya kakakuona.

sourceString: In addition, the distance between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is even shorter than that between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs.
targetString: Pia, umbali uliopo kati ya SARS-COV-2 na RaTG13 ni mfupi hata zaidi kuliko ule uliopo kati ya virusi vya beta-CoV vinavyohusiana na SARS-CoV-2 na SARS-CoV-2 vilivyopatikana kwa kakakuona.

sourceString: The evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in bats, pangolins and other mammals remains to be established.
targetString: Njia ya ukuaji wa SARS-CoV-2 katika popo, kakakuona na mamalia wengine bado inasalia kutambulika.

sourceString: Whereas the highest sequence homology has been found in the RBDs between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin, SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 share the highest genome-wide sequence homology.
targetString: Ingawa mfanano wa juu zaidi wa msururu umepatikana kwenye RBD kati ya beta-CoV vinavyohusiana na SARS-CoV-2 na SARS-CoV-2 vilivyopatikana kwa kakakuona, SARS-CoV-2 na RaTG13 vina mfanano wa juu wa msururu wa jinomu.

sourceString: It is highly speculative that the high degree of similarity between the RBDs of pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs and SARS-CoV-2 is driven by selectivity-mediated convergent evolution.
targetString: Inakisiwa pakubwa kwamba kiwango cha juu cha mfanano kati ya RBD za virusi vya beta-CoV vinavyohusiana na SARS-CoV-2 vinavyopatikana ndani ya kakakuona na SARS-CoV-2 hungozwa na ukuaji wa kimkusanyiko unaoletwa kwa msingi wa uteuzi.

sourceString: A counter-proposal is in favour of a recombination between a pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoV and RaTG13 in the third wild animal species.
targetString: Pendekezo kinzani linaunga mkono uunganishaji tena kati ya virusi vya beta-CoV vinavyohusiana na SARS-CoV-2 vilivyopatikana kwa kakakuona na RaTG13 katika aina ya tatu ya wanyama wa porini.

sourceString: As a driving force in evolution, recombination is widespread among beta-CoVs.
targetString: Kama msukumo katika ukuaji, uunganishaji tena umeenea miongoni mwa virusi vya beta-CoV.

sourceString: The jury is still out on the immediate zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Uamuzi bado haujafikiwa kuhusu asili ya karibu ya SARS-CoV-2 kutoka kwa wanyama.

sourceString: Besides the highly pathogenic HCoVs, the zoonotic origin of HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-HKU1 have also been studied.
targetString: Kando na uwezekano mkuu wa HCoV kusababisha magonjwa, asili ya HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 na HCoV-HKU1 kutoka kwa wanyama pia imefanyiwa utafiti.

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence indicated that both HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-229E might have originated from bat CoVs, while the parental viruses of HCoV-OC43 and HCoV-HKU1 have been found in rodents.
targetString: Ushahidi wa kifilogenetiki unaonyesha kwamba virusi vya HCoV-NL63 na HCoV-229E huenda vilitokana na bat-CoV, huku virusi vizazi vya HCoV-OC43 na HCoV-HKU1 vikipatikana ndani ya jamii ya panya.

sourceString: It has been reported that a bat CoV termed ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) detected in North American tricolored bat displayed close relationship with HCoV-NL63.
targetString: Imeripotiwa kwamba virusi vya bat CoV vinavyoitwa ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) vilivyogunduliwa Kaskazini mwa Marekani popo wa rangi tatu alionyesha uhusiano wa karibu na HCoV-NL63.

sourceString: On the other hand, HCoV-229E was genetically related to another bat CoV, termed Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008, which was detected in Ghana, while camelids have also been suspected as its intermediate host.
targetString: Kwa upande mwingine, virusi vya HCoV-229E vilihusiana kigenetiki na virusi vingine vya bat CoV, vinavyoitwa Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008, vilivyogunduliwa nchini Ghana, huku wanyama wadogo wa jamii ya ngamia pia wakishukiwa kuwa wabebaji wake wa kati.

sourceString: For clarity, the current knowledge on animal origins of known HCoVs is summarized in Figure ​1 and Table 2.
targetString: Kwa uwazi, maarifa ya sasa kuhusu asili ya wanyama ya virusi vya HCoV vinavyojulikana yamewekwa kwa njia ya muhtasari katika mchoro wa 1 na Jedwali la 2.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis has provided evidence for interspecies transmission events of HCoVs in the history.
targetString: Uchanganuzi wa kifilojenetiki umetoa ushahidi wa matukio ya usambazaji wa HCoV baina ya aina za wanyama katika historia.

sourceString: When HCoV-OC43 crossed species to infect humans from domestic livestock around 1890, a pandemic of respiratory infection was recorded.
targetString: Wakati virusi vya HCoV-OC43 vilisambaa baina ya wanyama na kuambukiza binadamu vikitoka kwa wanyama karibu mwaka wa1890, janga la maambukizi ya pumu lilishuhudiwa.

sourceString: The interspecies transmission history of HCoV-229E is less clear.
targetString: Historia ya usambazaji baina ya wanyama ya HCoV-229E si bayana.

sourceString: Bat alpha-CoVs closely related to HCoV-229E have been found.
targetString: Virusi vya alpha-CoV vya popo vinavyohusiana kwa karibu na HCoV-229E vimepatikana.

sourceString: Between them there is an alpaca alpha-CoV.
targetString: Kati ya virusi hivyo kuna virusi vya alpha-CoV vinavyopatikana kwa alpaca ambaye ni aina ya mnyama.

sourceString: Several lines of evidence support the transmission of virus from bats to humans directly.
targetString: Mistari kadhaa ya ushahidi huunga mkono usambazaji wa virusi wa moja kwa moja kutoka kwa popo hadi kwa binadamu.

sourceString: First, humans but not alpacas might have contact with bats in a shared ecological niche.
targetString: Kwanza, binadamu wala sio alpaca ambao ni wanyama huenda walikuwa na mgusano na popo katika mazingira walioshiriki ya kiekolojia.

sourceString: Instead, humans have close contact with alpacas.
targetString: Badala yake, binadamu wanatangamana kwa karibu na alpaca ambao ni wanyama.

sourceString: Second, HCoV-229E-related bat alpha-CoVs are diverse and non-pathogenic in bats, whereas alpaca alpha-CoV caused an outbreak of respiratory disease in infected animals.
targetString: Pili, virusi vya alpha-CoVs vya popo vinavyohusiana na HCoV-229E ni tofauti na havina uwezo wa kusababisha ugonjwa ndani ya popo, ilhali virusi vya alpha-CoV vilivyopatikana kwa alpaca vilisababisha mkurupuko wa ugonjwa wa kupumua kwa wanyama walioambukizwa.

sourceString: Finally, alpaca alpha-CoV has not been found in feral animals.
targetString: Mwisho, virusi vya alpha-CoV vilivyopatikana kwa alpaca havijapatikana ndani ya wanyama wa mwituni.

sourceString: Thus, the possibility cannot be excluded that alpacas obtain the HCoV-229E-related alpha-CoV from humans.
targetString: Hivyo, uwezekano wa alpaca kupata virusi vya alpha-CoV vinavyohusiana na HCoV-229E kutoka kwa binadamu hauwezi kufungiwa nje.

sourceString: In fact, bats are the direct source of human pathogenic viruses including rabies virus, Ebola virus, Nipah virus and Hendra virus.
targetString: Hakika, popo ndio chanzo cha moja kwa moja cha virusi vinavyosababisha ugonjwa kwa binadamu ikiwa ni pamoja na virusi vya kichaa cha mbwa, virusi vya Ebola, virusi vya Nipah na virusi vya Hendra.

sourceString: It is therefore not too surprising that bats might transmit HCoV-229E to humans directly.
targetString: Kwa hivyo si ajabu sana kwamba popo wana uwezo wa kusambaza HCoV-229E moja kwa moja kwa binadamu.

sourceString: Alternatively, whereas bat alpha-CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoV-229E, alpacas and dromedary camels might serve as intermediate hosts that transmit viruses to humans, exactly as in the case of MERS-CoV.
targetString: Vinginevyo, ingawa virusi vya alpha-CoV vinatumika kama kikoa cha jeni cha HCoV-229E, alpaca na ngamia warefu zaidi huenda wanatumika kama wabebaji wa kati wa virusi wanaosambaza virusi kwa binadamu, hasa ilivyo katika hali ya MERS-CoV.

sourceString: MERS-CoV serves as an excellent example of interspecies transmission from bats to dromedary camels and from dromedary camels to humans.
targetString: Virusi vya MERS-CoV vinatumika kama mfano bora wa usambazaji baina ya wanyama kutoka kwa popo hadi kwa ngamia warefu na kutoka kwa ngamia warefu hadi kwa binadamu.

sourceString: The evolutionary origin of MERS-CoV from bats is known at its initial identification and has also been strengthened by subsequent findings.
targetString: Asili ya ukuaji ya MERS-CoV kutoka kwa popo inafahamika katika utambuzi wake wa kwanza na pia imethibitishwa na matokeo yaliyofuatia.

sourceString: It is obvious that bats provide a rich pool of virus species for interspecies exchange of genetic fragments and interspecies transmission.
targetString: Ni wazi kwamba popo hutoa mkusanyiko mkuu wa aina ya virusi kwa ajili ya mabadilishano baina ya wanyama ya visehemu za kijenetiki na usambazaji baina ya wanyama.

sourceString: Longevity, densely packed colonies, close social interaction and strong ability to fly are all favourable conditions for bats to be an ideal 'virus spreader'.
targetString: Uwezo wa kuishi kwa muda mrefu, makazi yenye wanyama wengi, miingiliano ya karibu ya kijamii na uwezo thabiti wa kuruka ni hali zinazomfanya popo kuwa 'mnyama anayeweza kueneza virusi'.

sourceString: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has been introduced to dromedary camels for decades.
targetString: Kwa upande mwingine, virusi vya MERS-CoV vimekuwa ndani ya ngamia warefu kwa muda wa miongo.

sourceString: It is well adapted to these camels that have turned from an intermediate host to a stable and natural reservoir host.
targetString: Vilizoeleka vyema ndani ya ngamia hawa ambao wamegeuka kutoka kwa wabebaji wa kati wa virusi hadi kuwa wabebaji thabiti na asilia wanaohifadhi virusi.

sourceString: MERS-CoV causes very mild disease and maintains a relatively low mutation rate in these animals.
targetString: MERS-CoV husababisha ugonjwa kiasi sana na hudumisha kiwango cha chini cha kubadilika ikilinganishwa miongoni mwa wanyama hawa.

sourceString: Its sporadic transmission to humans is an accident and humans remain a dead-end host of MERS-CoV as its transmission cannot be sustained.
targetString: Usambazaji wake wa mara moja moja kwa binadamu ni ajali na binadamu wanasalia kuwa wabebaji wa mwisho wa MERS-CoV wasioambukizana kwa sababu usambazaji wake hauwezi kudumu.

sourceString: In contrast to the role of camels in the transmission of MERS-CoV, the role of pangolins, if there is any, in the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 is different.
targetString: Kinyume chake, jukumu la ngamia katika usambazaji wa MERS-CoV, jukumu la kakakuona, ikiwa kuna lolote, katika usambazaji wa SARS-CoV-2 ni tofauti.

sourceString: Particularly, pangolin beta-CoVs are highly pathogenic in pangolins.
targetString: Hususan, virusi vya beta-CoV vinavyopatikana kwa kakakuona vina uwezo mkubwa wa kusababisha magonjwa ndani ya kakakuona.

sourceString: They might be a dead-end host for SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, similar to civets in the case of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Wanaweza kuwa ndio wabebaji virusi vya beta-CoV vinavyohusiana na SARS-CoV-2- visivyoweza kuambukiza, sawa na ngawa katika hali ya SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Several possibilities for interspecies transmission of SARS-CoV-2 from animals to humans have to be ruled in or ruled out in future studies.
targetString: Uwezekano kadhaa wa usambazaji wa SARS-CoV-2 baina ya viumbe kutoka kwa wanyama hadi kwa binadamu lazima uweze kukubalika au kukataliwa katika utafiti wa sku zijazo.

sourceString: First, bats could be the reservoir host of a SARS-CoV-2-related virus almost identical to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Kwanza, popo wanaweza kuwa wabebaji wahifadhi wa virusi vinavyohusiana na SARS-CoV-2 vinavyokaribia kufanana na SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Humans might share the ecological niche with bats through butchering or coal mining.
targetString: Binadamu wanaweza kushiriki mazingira ya kiekolojia na popo kupitia uchinjaji au uchimbaji makaa ya mawe.

sourceString: Second, pangolins could be one of intermediate amplifying host to which a SARS-CoV-2-related virus had been newly introduced.
targetString: Pili, kakakuona wanaweza kuwa mojawapo ya wabebaji wa kati wanaosambaza virusi ambao wamepata virusi vinavyohusiana na SARS-CoV-2 kwa mara ya kwanza.

sourceString: Humans contract the virus through butchering and consumption of game meat.
targetString: Binadamu hupata virusi kupitia kuchinja na kula nyama ya wanyama wa porini.

sourceString: It is possible that many mammals including domestic animals are susceptible to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Kuna uwezekano kwamba mamalia wengi ikiwa ni pamoja na wanyama wa nyumbani wanaweza kupata SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: A survey of domestic and wild animals for antibodies is warranted.
targetString: Uchunguzi wa wanyama wa nyumbani na wa porini kwa ajili ya antibodi unastahiki.

sourceString: Third, as mentioned above, recombination and adaptation of SARS-CoV-2 might have occurred in a third species that has contact with both bats and pangolins.
targetString: Tatu, kama ilivyotajwa hapa juu, kujumuishwa tena na kuzoeleka kwa SARS-CoV-2 huenda kulifanyika katika kiumbe cha tatu ambacho kilitangmana na popo na kakakuona.

sourceString: The search for the animal origins of SARS-CoV-2 is still on.
targetString: Utafutaji wa sili ya SARS-CoV-2 kutoka kwa wanyama bado unaendelea.

sourceString: Apart from different types of the animal hosts, three major factors on the viral side are also important in facilitating CoVs to cross species barriers.
targetString: Kando na aina tofauti za wanyama wabebaji, vigezo vitatu vikuu kwenye upande wa virusi pia ni muhimu katika kuwezesha virusi vya CoVs kusambazwa kwa viumbe.

sourceString: First of all, their relatively high mutation rates in RNA replication.
targetString: Kwanza kabisa, viwango vyao vya juu vya kubadilika katika uzalishaji wa RNA.

sourceString: In comparison to other single-stranded RNA viruses, the estimated mutation rates of CoVs could be regarded as “moderate” to “high” with an average substitution rate being ~10-4 substitution per year per site 2, depending on the phase of CoV adaptation to novel hosts.
targetString: Ikilinganisha na virusi vingine vya RNA moja, viwango vilivyokadiriwa vya kubadilika kwa CoV vinaweza kuzingatiwa kuwa “wastani” au “juu” huku kiwango cha wastani cha ubadilishanaji kikiwa ~10-4 kwa kila mwaka kwa kila eneo 2, kwa kutegemea awamu ya kuzoeleka kwa CoV kwenye mbebaji wake mpya.

sourceString: CoVs have a proof-reading exoribonuclease, deletion of which results in exceedingly high mutability and attenuation or even inviability.
targetString: Virusi vya CoVs vina eksoribonuklisi ya udurusu, ambayo kufutwa kwake husababisha kuongezeka kwa uwezo wa kubadilika, kupunguza athari au hata uwezo wake.

sourceString: Interestingly, the nucleotide analogue Remdesivir is known to suppress CoV replication through inhibition of this exoribonuclease and the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.
targetString: Jambo la kupendeza ni kuwa, dawa ya nucleotide analogue Remdesivir inafahamika kudidimisha uzalishaji wa CoV kupitia uzuiaji wa eksoribonuklisi na RNA polimerisi inayotegemea RNA.

sourceString: Remdesivir is one of most promising anti-SARS-CoV-2 agents to be tested in clinical trials.
targetString: Remdesivir ni mojawapo ya chanjo iliyo na uwezo mkubwa dhidi ya SARS-CoV-2 iliyofanyiwa majaribio ya kimatibabu.

sourceString: Nevertheless, mutation rates of CoVs are about a million times higher than those of their hosts.
targetString: Licha ya hayo, viwango vya kubadilika kwa CoV ni takriban mara milioni zaidi ya vile vya wabebaji wake.

sourceString: In addition, mutation rate is often high when CoVs are not well adapted to the host.
targetString: Pia, viwango vya kubadilika mara nyingi huwa juu wakati ambapo virusi vya CoV havijazoeleka kwenye mbebaji.

sourceString: Compared to SARS-CoV with a high mutation rate, the mutation rate of SARS-CoV-2 is apparently lower, suggestive of a higher level of adaptation to humans.
targetString: Ikilinganishwa na virusi vya SARS-CoV vilivyo na viwango vya juu vya kubadilika, viwango vya kubadilika kwa SARS-CoV-2 ni bayana kuwa viko chini, hali inayoashiria uwezekano wa juu zaidi wa kuzoeleka kwa binadamu.

sourceString: Presumably, it has already been adapted to another host close to humans.
targetString: Inaweza kuchukuliwa kwamba, tayari vimezoeleka kwa mbebaji mwingine wa karibu na binadamu.

sourceString: In addition to SARS-CoV-2, this also applies to MERS-CoV, which is well adapted to dromedary camels.
targetString: Pamoja na SARS-CoV-2, hii pia hutumika kwa MERS-CoV, virusi ambayo vimezoeleka vyema ndani ya ngamia warefu zaidi.

sourceString: Theoretically, it is unlikely that genetic drift would render vaccines and antivirals against SARS-CoV-2 ineffective quickly.
targetString: Kinadharia, hakuna uwezekano kwamba mabadiliko ya kijenetiki yanaweza kufanya chanjo na dawa za kupambana na virusi dhidi ya SARS-CoV-2 zisiwe za kufaa haraka.

sourceString: Second, the large RNA genome in CoVs exerts extra plasticity in genome modification for mutations and recombination, thereby increasing the probability for interspecies co-evolution, which is advantageous for the emergence of novel CoVs when the conditions become appropriate.
targetString: Pili, jinomu kubwa ya RNA kwenye CoVs ina uwezo zaidi wa kubadilika umbo katika urekebishaji wa jinomu kwa ajili ya mabadiliko na uunganishaji tena, hivyo kuongeza uwezekano wa ukuaji pamoja baina ya viumbe, jambo ambalo ni la manufaa kwa kuibuka kwa CoV mpya hali zikiwa zinafaa.

sourceString: This is supported by the copious unique open reading frames and protein functions encoded towards the 3′ end of the genome.
targetString: Haya yanaungwa mkono na fremu maalum wazi zilizo tele na utendakazi wa protini zilizosimbwa kuelekea mwisho wa 3 wa jinomu.

sourceString: Third, CoVs randomly and frequently switch templates during RNA replication through a unique “copy-choice” mechanism.
targetString: Tatu, CoV bila mpangilio na mara kwa mara hubadili kiolezo wakati wa uzalishaji wa RNA kupitia utaratibu maalum wa "copy-choice".

sourceString: In a host that serves as the mixing vessel, strand switching occurs frequently during CoV RNA transcription.
targetString: Ndani ya mbebaji virusi anayetumika kama chombo cha kuchanganyia, ubadilishaji wa strandi hufanyika mara kwa mara wakati wa kunakiliwa kwa CoV RNA.

sourceString: Highly homologous full-length and subgenomic RNAs could recombine to generate new CoVs.
targetString: RNA zinazofanana zaidi za urefu kamili na za jinomu ndogo zinaweza kuungana tena ili kuzalisha COV mpya.

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence of natural recombination has been found in both HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-OC43, as well as animal CoVs such as bat SL-CoV and batCoV-HKU9.
targetString: Ushahidi wa kifilojenetiki wa uunganishaji tena asilia umepatikana katika HCoV-HKU1 na HCoV-OC43, na vilevile virusi vyaCoV vilivyopatikana ndani ya wanyama kama vile virusi vya SL-CoV ya popo na virusi vya CoV-HKU9 vya popo.

sourceString: Virus-host interaction in relation to transmission
targetString: Mwingiliano wa mbebaji virusi ukihusishwa na usambazaji

sourceString: Besides three viral factors stated above, viral interaction with host receptor is another key factor influential on interspecies transmission.
targetString: Kando na vigezo vitatu vya virusi vilivyotajwa hapa juu, mwingiliano wa virusi vipokezi vya mbebaji ni kigezo kingine muhimu chenye ushawishi kwenye usambazaji baina ya viumbe.

sourceString: Herein, recombination of SARS-CoV is taken as a typical example, which also showed evidence of positive selection during interspecies transmission events.
targetString: Hapa ndani, kuunganishwa tena kwa SARS-CoV kunazingatiwa kuwa mfano wa kawaida, ambao pia ulionyesha ushahidi wa uteuzi chanya wakati wa matukio ya usambazaji baina ya viumbe.

sourceString: Based on the comparative analysis between isolates of human and civet SARS-CoVs, SARS-CoV is thought to undergo rapid adaptation in different hosts, particularly with mutations at the RBD of the S protein.
targetString: Kulingana na uchanganuzi wa kiulinganisho kati ya SARS-CoV ndani ya binadamu na ngawa, SARS-CoV inadhaniwa kuzoeleka haraka ndani ya wabebaji tofauti, hasa kwa mabadiliko katika RBD ya protini ya S.

sourceString: Generally, the RBD in the S protein of a CoV interacts with the cellular receptor and is intensely selected by the host antibody response.
targetString: Kwa jumla, RBD kwenye protini ya S ya CoV huingiliana na kipokezi cha seli na huteuliwa kwa kina na jibu la antibodi ya mbebaji.

sourceString: In SARS-CoV, the RBD is in the 318th to 510th amino acids on the S1 fragment, which binds to the human ACE2 as well as its coreceptors for viral entry.
targetString: Katika SARS-CoV, RBD ndiyo asidi amino ya 318 na ya 510 katika kipande cha S1, ambayo hunata ACE2 ya kibinadamu pamoja na vipokezi vikuu kwa ajili ya kuingia kwa virusi.

sourceString: The RBD of SARS-CoV is capable of recognizing the ACE2 receptors of various animals, including bat, civet, mouse and raccoon dog, allowing interspecies transmission of the virus.
targetString: RBD ya SARS-CoV ina uwezo wa kutambua vipokezi vya ACE2 vya wanyama mbalimbali, ikiwa ni pamoja na popo, ngawa, panya na mbwa, na kuruhusu usambazaji wa virusi baina ya viumbe.

sourceString: In fact, only 6 amino acid residues were observed to be different from human and civet viral isolates in the RBD and 4 of them locate in the receptor-binding motif for interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: Hakika, ni mabaki 6 ya asidi amino pekee ndiyo yalipatikana kuwa tofauti kutoka kwa virusi vilivyotengwa kutoka kwa binadamu na ngawa kwenye RBD na 4 kati yazo ziko katika sehemu ya kuunganisha vipokezi kwa ajili ya miingiliano na kipokezi cha ACE2.

sourceString: Civet SARS-CoV has K479N and S487T mutations in its RBD, which might increase the affinity of the interaction of spike protein with human ACE2 receptor.
targetString: Virusi vya SARS-CoV vilivyo ndani ya Ngawa vina mabadiliko ya K479N na S487T kwenye RBD yavyo, jambo linaloweza kuzidisha uwezekano wa mwingiliano wa protini ya S na vipokezi vya binadamu vya ACE2.

sourceString: In other words, these two amino acid substitutions might be critical to viral adaption to humans.
targetString: Yaani, ubadilishaji wa asidi amino hizi mbili unaweza kuwa muhimu katika virusi kuzoeleka kwa binadamu.

sourceString: It is noteworthy that SARS-CoV-2 shares the same cellular receptor with SARS-CoV.
targetString: Ni muhimu kukumbuka kwamba virusi vya SARS-CoV-2 vina vipokezi sawa vya seli na SARS-CoV.

sourceString: A 30% difference between SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV in the S1 unit of the S protein implicates that the binding affinity of its S protein with human ACE2 might have altered.
targetString: Tofauti ya 30% kati ya SARS-CoV-2 na SARS-CoV kwenye kitengo cha S1 cha protini ya S huashiria kwamba uwezo wa protini ya S kuunganishwa na ACE2 ya binadamu huenda umebadilisha.

sourceString: Indeed, a cryo-EM study indicates a 10- to 20-fold higher affinity of this binding than that between human ACE2 and SARS-CoV S protein.
targetString: Bila shaka, utafiti wa cryo-EM unaonyesha uwezekano wa mnato wa 10- hadi 20-zaidi wa mnato huu kuliko kati ya protini ya binadamu ya ACE2 na ya SARS-CoV S.

sourceString: It will also be of interest to determine whether any other coreceptor might be required for SARS-CoV-2 transmission.
targetString: Iitakuwa jambo la kuvutia kubaini iwapo vitambuzi vyovyote vyenza vinaweza kuhitajika kwa ajili ya usambazaji wa SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Intriguingly, HCoV-NL63 also binds to ACE2 but with a different part of S.
targetString: Inashangaza kwamba, HCoV-NL63 pia hunata kwenye ACE2 lakini kwa sehemu tofauti ya S.

sourceString: There exist many other HCoV receptors, such as aminopeptidase N for HCoV-229E, and 9-O-acetylated sialic acid for HCoV-OC43.
targetString: Kuna vipokezi vingine vingi vya HCoV, kama vile aminopeptidisi N vya HCoV-229E, na asidi ya kupambana na gluteni ya 9-O-acetylated vya HCoV-OC43.

sourceString: They might also account for successful adaptation of these CoVs in humans after interspecies transmission from their animal hosts.
targetString: Vinaweza pia kusababisha ufanisi wa kuzoeleka kwa virusi hivi vya CoV kwa binadamu baada ya kusambazwa baina ya viumbe kutoka kwa wanyama wao wabebaji.

sourceString: In addition to cellular receptors, the outcome of interspecies transmission of HCoVs is also governed by other host dependency and restriction factors.
targetString: Pamoja na vipokezi vya seli, matokeo ya usambazaji wa HCoV baina ya viumbe pia hutawaliwa na utegemezi na wabebaji wengine na vigezo vya uzuiaji.

sourceString: The divergence of these host proteins between humans and natural reservoir hosts of HCoVs such as bats, dromedary camels and rodents might constitute a barrier to interspecies transmission.
targetString: Tofauti ya protini hizi za wanyama wabebaji kati ya binadamu na wabebaji asilia wahifadhi wa virusi vya HCoV kama vile popo, ngamia warefu zaidi na wanyama wagugunaji huenda ukawa kikwazo kwa usambazaji baina ya viumbe.

sourceString: HCoVs have to usurp host dependency factors and subvert host restriction factors for a successful interspecies transmission.
targetString: Ni lazima virusi vya HCoV vivamie vipengee vya utegemezi vya mbebaji virusi na kubadilisha vipengee vya uzuiaji vya mbebaji virusi ili kufanikiwa kusambaza virusi baina ya viumbe.

sourceString: In this regard, molecular determinants in this important area of virus-host interaction remain to be identified and characterized.
targetString: Kwa mintaarafu hii, vibainishi vya kimolekuli katika sehemu hii muhimu ya mwingiliano baina ya virusi na mbebaji wake bado havijatambuliwa na kuainishwa.

sourceString: An unbiased genome-wide screening of host dependency and restriction factors for SARS-CoV-2 using the state-of-the-art technology of CRISPR might be fruitful.
targetString: Ukaguzi yakinifu wa kina wa mbebaji wa jinomu ulio tegemezi na vigezo vya uzuiaji vya SARS-CoV-2 kwa kutumia teknolojia ya aina yake ya CRISPR huenda ukazaa matunda.

sourceString: Emergence of novel HCoVs: back to ground zero
targetString: Kuibuka kwa virusi vipya vya HCoV: kurudi nyuma kabisa

sourceString: The diversity of bat CoVs provides ample opportunities for the emergence of novel HCoVs.
targetString: Aina mbalimbali za bat CoV hutoa fursa tele za kuibuka kwa HCoV vipya.

sourceString: In this sense, bat CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoVs.
targetString: Kwa mantiki hii, virusi vya CoV vya popo hutumika kama mkusanyiko wa jeni wa HCoV mbalimbali.

sourceString: In addition, rapid mutation and genetic recombination also drive HCoV evolution and serve as two important steps in this process.
targetString: Pamoja na hayo, kubadilika haraka na kuunganishwa kijenetiki pia huwezesha ukuaji wa HCoV na huwa hatua mbili muhimu katika mchakato huu.

sourceString: For example, the acquisition or loss of novel protein-coding genes has the potential to drastically modify viral phenotypes.
targetString: Kwa mfano, kupata au kupoteza jeni mpya inayosimba protini kuna uwezekano wa kubadilisha haraka sampuli ya virusi.

sourceString: Among SARS-CoV accessory proteins, ORF8 has been thought to be important in adaptation to humans, as SARS-CoV-related bat viruses were isolated but found to encode divergent ORF8 proteins.
targetString: Miongoni mwa protini za ufikiaji za SARS-CoV, ORF8 imedhaniwa kuwa muhimu katika kuzoeleka kwa binadamu, kwa kuwa virusi vya SARS-CoV vinavyohusiana na popo vilitolewa lakini vikapatikana kusimba protini tofauti za ORF8.

sourceString: A 29-nucleotide deletion characteristic of SARS-CoVs has been found in strains isolated at the beginning of the human epidemic.
targetString: Sifa ya ufutaji wa nukleotidi 29 ya SARS-CoV imepatikana katika sampuli zilizotengwa mwanzoni mwa janga la binadamu.

sourceString: This deletion splits ORF8 into ORF8a and ORF8b and is thought to be an adaptive mutation that promotes the switch of hosts.
targetString: Ufutaji huu hugawa ORF8 ikawa ORF8a na ORF8b na inadhaniwa kuwa mabadiliko ya kuzoeleka yanayowezesha kubadilishwa kwa wabebaji virusi.

sourceString: Besides, SARS-CoV has a possible recombination history with lineages of alpha- and gamma-CoVs, where a large number of smaller recombinant regions were identified in the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.
targetString: Vilevile, SARS-CoV ina uwezekano wa kuwa na historia ya kuunganishwa na vizazi vya alpha- na gamma-CoVs, ambapo idadi kubwa ya maeneo madogo madogo ya vipengee vya kuunganishwa ilitambuliwa kwenye polimerisi ya RNA inayotegemea RNA.

sourceString: Recombination locations were also identified in the nsp9, most of nsp10, and parts of nsp14.
targetString: Maeneo ya kuunganishwa pia yalitambuliwa katika nsp9, nsp10 nyingi na sehemu za nsp14.

sourceString: Likewise, it has been shown that the epidemic MERS-CoV experienced recombination events between different lineages, which occurred in dromedary camels in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: Vilevile, imeonyeshwa kwamba janga la MERS-CoV lilishuhudia matukio ya uunganishaji kati ya vizazi tofauti, uliotokea katika ngamia warefu zaidi nchini Saudi Arabia.

sourceString: Besides SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, recombination events have also been observed in other HCoVs, in which the HCoVs recombine with other animal CoVs in their non-structural genes.
targetString: Kando na SARS-CoV na MERS-CoV, matukio ya kuunganishwa tena kuwa aina nyingine ya HCoV yameshuhudiwa pia, ambapo HCoV mbalimbali huunganishwa tena na na virusi vingine vya CoV vya wanyama kwenye jeni zao zisizo na umbo.

sourceString: It should also be cautioned that artificial selection can contribute to unintended changes in viral genomes, most likely resulting from relieving viruses from selection pressures exerted, such as by the host immune system.
targetString: Tahadhari pia inapaswa kukumbukwa kwamba uteuzi wa bandia unaweza kuchangia katika mabadiliko yasiyonuiwa katika jinomu za virusi, mara nyingi kutokana na kuondolea virusi mashinikizo ya uteuzi, kama vile mfumo wa kinga ya mwili wa mbebaji virusi.

sourceString: An example of these effects is the loss of a full-length ORF4 in the HCoV-229E prototype strain, owing to a two-nucleotide deletion.
targetString: Mfano wa athari hizi ni kupotea kwa urefu kamili wa ORF4 katika sampuli awali ya HCoV-229E, kutokana na kufutwa kwa nukleotidi mbili.

sourceString: While intact ORF4 could be observed in bat and camel viruses related to HCoV-229E, the alpaca alpha-CoV displays a single nucleotide insertion, resulting in a frameshift.
targetString: Huku ORF4 thabiti ikiwa na uwezekano wa kupatikana kwenye virusi vinavyopatikana kwenye popo na ngamia vinavyohusiana na HCoV-229E, virusi vya alpha-CoV vilivyopatikana kwenye alpaca vilionyesha kuwekwa kwa nukleotidi moja, kukisababisha kubadilika kwa fremu.

sourceString: Last but not least, the evolution of novel HCoVs is also driven by the selection pressure in their reservoir hosts.
targetString: Hatimaye, ukuaji wa virusi vipya vya HCoV pia hutokana na shinikizo la uteuzi kwenye hifadhi ya mbebaji virusi.

sourceString: Asymptomatic or only mild symptoms were detected when bats were infected with CoVs, indicating the mutual adaptation between CoVs and bats.
targetString: Kutokuwepo kwa dalili au dalili za kiasi ndizo ziligunduliwa wakati popo waliambukizwa na CoV, ikiashiria kuzoeleka kwa pamoja kati ya CoV na popo.

sourceString: It appeared that bats are well adapted to CoVs anatomically and physiologically.
targetString: Ilionekana kwamba virusi vya CoV vilizoeleka kwa popo vyema kimuundo na kiutendakazi wa mwili.

sourceString: For example, defects in the activation of pro-inflammatory response in bats efficiently reduce the pathology triggered by CoVs.
targetString: Kwa mfano, hitilafu katika kukabiliana na hali ya kuchomeka ndani ya popo kulifanikisha kupunguza uwezo wa kusababisha ugonjwa kunaowezeshwa na CoV.

sourceString: Besides, the natural killer cell activity in bats is suppressed due to upregulation of inhibitory natural killer cell receptor NKG2/CD94 and low expression level of major histocompatibility complex class I molecules.
targetString: Vilevile, shughuli ya seli ya uuwaji asilia kwenye popo imedidimizwa kutokana na kuzalishwa kwa vipokezi vizuizi vya seli ya uuwaji asilia ya NKG2/CD94 na kiwango cha chini cha molekuli za aina ya I za mchanganyiko wa uoanifu wa tishu.

sourceString: Moreover, the high level of reactive oxygen species (ROS) generated from high metabolic activity of bats could both suppress CoV replication and affects proofreading by exoribonuclease, thus providing the selection pressure for the generation of virus strains highly pathogenic when introduced into a new host.
targetString: Isitoshe, kiwango kikubwa cha aina za oksijeni tendaji (ROS) zinazozalishwa kutokana na shughuli nyingi mwilini mwa popo zinaweza kudidimiza mwigo wa CoV na kuathiri mapitio ya Eksoribonuklisi, hivyo kutoa shinikizo la uteuzi kwa ajili ya uzalishaji wa aina ya virusi vilivyo na uwezo mkuu wa kusababisha ugonjwa vinapoingizwa katika mazingira mapya.

sourceString: More pathogenic CoV strains might also evolve by recombination, leading to the acquisition of novel proteins or protein features for host adaptation.
targetString: Sampuli zaidi za kusababisha ugonjwa za CoV zinaweza kukua kupitia uunganishaji tena, na kusababisha kupatikana kwa protini mpya au sifa za protini kwa ajili ya kuzoeleka kwenye mbebaji.

sourceString: Thus, it is not by chance that three novel HCoVs have emerged in the past two decades.
targetString: Hivyo, si kwa bahati kuwa virusi vitatu vipya vya HCoVs vimeibuka katika kipindi cha miongo miwili iliyopita.

sourceString: CoVs are non-pathogenic or cause mild symptoms in their reservoir hosts such as bats and camels.
targetString: Virusi vya CoV havina uwezo wa kusababisha ugonjwa au husababisha dalili za kiasi kwa wabebaji wahifadhi wao kama vile popo na ngamia.

sourceString: They replicate robustly without eliciting a strong host immune response.
targetString: Huzalishwa kwa wingi bila kuonyesha makabiliano ya kinga thabiti ya mwili ya mbebaji wake.

sourceString: Herein lie the secrets of why asymptomatic carriers are seen and what causes the severe cases in human infection.
targetString: Hapa kuna siri kuhusu ni kwa nini wabebaji virusi wasio na dalili hupatikana na kinachosababisha visa kali katika maambukizi ya binadamu.

sourceString: The severe symptoms are mainly due to the hyperactivation of immune response and the cytokine storm wherein the stronger the immune response, the more severe the lung damage.
targetString: Dalili kali mara nyingi hutokana na kuchochewa sana na kinga ya mwili kupigana kupita kiasi na mlipuko wa saitokini ambapo kinga ya mwili likiwa thabiti sana, mapafu huharibika zaidi.

sourceString: In contrast, in asymptomatic carriers, the immune response has been de-coupled from CoV replication.
targetString: Kwa upande mwingine, katika wabebaji wasio na dalili, makabiliano ya kinga ya mwili hutenganishwa kutoka kwa uzalishaji wa CoV.

sourceString: The same strategy of delinking the immune response might have beneficial effects in anti-SARS-CoV-2 therapy.
targetString: Mkakati sawa wa kutenganisha makabiliano ya kinga ya mwili unaweza kuwa na manufaa katika tiba dhidi ya SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: The interferon response is particularly strong in bats.
targetString: Athari ya protini zinazotolewa na mbebaji virusi ni thabiti hususan kwenye popo.

sourceString: Thus, administration of type I interferon at least in the early phase of SARS-CoV-2 infection in humans should be beneficial.
targetString: Hivyo, utoaji wa protini zinazotolewa na mbebaji virusi za aina ya I angalau katika awamu ya mapema ya maambukizi ya SARS-CoV-2 katika binadamu kunapaswa kuwa na manufaa.

sourceString: In addition, NLRP3 inflammasome activation in bats is defective.
targetString: Isitoshe, kuamilishwa kwa NLRP3 inflammasome kwenye popo huwa na madhara.

sourceString: By this reasoning, inhibition of NLRP3 inflammasome with MCC950 might be useful in the treatment of COVID-19.
targetString: Kwa mantiki hii, uzuiaji wa NLRP3 inflammasome kwa kutumia MCC950 kunaweza kuwa muhimu katika matibabu ya COVID-19.

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 follows the general theme by which SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV arose.
targetString: Kuibuka kwa SARS-CoV-2 kunafuata mtindo wa kijumla ambapo virusi vya SARS-CoV na MERS-CoV viliibuka.

sourceString: Whereas a bat beta-CoV sharing 95% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV has been found, there also exists a bat-CoV sharing 96% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Ingawa virusi vya beta-CoV vya popo vilivyo na mfanano wa 95% wa nukleotidi na SARS-CoV vimepatikana, pia kuna virusi vya-CoV vya popo viliyo na mfanano wa 96% wa nukleotidi na SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Whereas civets and other animals in the markets have been found to harbour viruses identical to SARS-CoV, immediate intermediate hosts for SARS-CoV-2 have not been identified.
targetString: Ijapokuwa ngawa na wanyama wengine sokoni wamepatikana kuwa na virusi vinavyofanana na SARS-CoV, wabebaji wa kati wa karibu wa SARS-CoV-2 hawajatambuliwa.

sourceString: Pangolin beta-CoVs strikingly homologous to SARS-CoV-2 have been found, indicating that pangolins might serve as one of intermediate hosts or pangolin beta-CoVs could contribute gene fragments to the final version of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: virusi vya Beta-CoVs vinavyopatikana kwa kakakuona ambavyo vinafanana sana na SARS-CoV-2 vimepatikana, hii inaashiria kwamba kakakuona wanaweza kuwa wabebaji wa kati au virusi vya beta-CoV vinavyopatikana kwa kakakuona vinaweza kuchangia vipande vya jeni kwa aina ya mwisho ya SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Although questions remain, there is no evidence that SARS-CoV-2 is man-made either deliberately or accidentally.
targetString: Ingawa maswali bado yanasalia, hakuna ushahidi kwamba virusi vya SARS-CoV-2 vimetengenezwa na binadamu kwa kukusudia kwa bahati mbaya.

sourceString: CoVs have returned to the limelight due to the recent outbreak of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Virusi vya CoV vimerejea kumilikwa tena kutokana na mkurupuko wa hivi majuzi wa SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: The study of CoVs in bats and other animals has drastically changed our perception of the importance of zoonotic origins and animal reservoirs of HCoVs in human transmission.
targetString: Utafiti wa virusi vya CoV ndani ya popo na wanyama wengine umebadilisha haraka mitazamo yetu kuhusu umuhimu wa machimbuko ya wanyama na uhifadhi wa wanyama wa HCoV katika usambazaji kwa binadamu.

sourceString: Pervasive evidence has shown that SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 have a bat origin and are transmitted to humans via intermediate hosts.
targetString: Ushahidi uliotanda kote umeonyesha kwamba SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV na SARS-CoV-2 vina chimbuko kutoka kwa popo na vinasambazwa kwa binadamu kupitia wabebaji wa kati.

sourceString: Given that SARS-CoV infection originates from the contact between humans and civets in the markets, closing wet markets and killing civets therein could have effectively ended the SARS epidemic.
targetString: Kwa kuwa maambukizi ya SARS-CoV hutokana na kutangamana kati ya binadamu na ngawa sokoni, kufunga soko za wanyama na kuwauwa ngawa wote mle kungesaidia kungefanikiwa kukomesha janga la SARS.

sourceString: By the same reasoning, pangolins should be removed from wet markets to prevent zoonotic transmission, in view of the discovery of multiple lineages of pangolin beta-CoVs closely related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Kwa mantiki sawa na hiyo, kakakuona wanapaswa kuondolewa kwenye soko la wanyama ili kuzuia usambazaji wa wanyama, kutokana na ugunduzi wa vizazi vingi vya beta-CoV vinavyopatikana kwa kakakuona vinavyohusiana kwa karibu na SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: However, whether and how SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted to humans through pangolins and other mammals remain to be clarified in future investigations.
targetString: Hata hivyo, iwapo na jinsi virusi vya SARS-CoV-2 husambazwa kwa binadamu kupitia kakakuona na mamalia wengine inasalia kuwekwa wazi katika uchunguzi wa siku zijazo.

sourceString: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has existed in dromedary camels for a long time.
targetString: Kwa upande mwingine, virusi vya MERS-CoV vimekuwepo ndani ya ngamia warefu zaidi kwa muda mrefu.

sourceString: These camels serve as an important tool for transportation as well as a main source of meat, milk, leather and wool products for the local people.
targetString: Ngamia hawa hutumika kama zana muhimu katika kusafirisha pamoja na chanzo kikuu cha nyama, maziwa, bidhaa za ngozi na bidhaa za pamba kwa watu mtaani.

sourceString: They are widely distributed across the Middle East and Africa.
targetString: Wamesambaa pakubwa kote Mashariki ya Kati na Afrika.

sourceString: It is therefore impossible to sacrifice all camels for the control of MERS, as what was done in wild animal markets in China to prevent the spreading of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Kwa hivyo haiwezekani kuwauwa ngamia wote ili kudhibiti MERS, kama ilivyofanywa katika masoko ya wanyama wa porini nchini China ili kuzuia kuenea kwa SARS-CoV na SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: To stop the recurrent outbreaks of MERS, a comprehensive approach should be taken to develop effective vaccines against MERS-CoV for camels, in combination with other infection control measures.
targetString: Ili kukomesha mikurupuko ya mara kwa mara ya MERS, mwelekeo tondoti unapaswa kuchukuliwa ili kuunda chanjo inayofaa dhidi ya MERS-CoV kwa ngamia, pamoja na mikakati mingine ya kudhibiti maambukizi.

sourceString: As we are not able to eliminate these viruses, new genotypes might emerge to cause outbreaks.
targetString: Kwa sababu hatuwezi kuondoa virusi hivi, aina mpya inaweza kuibuka na kusababisha mikurupuko.

sourceString: A variety of zoonotic CoVs are circulating in the wild.
targetString: Aina nyingi za virusi vya CoV vinayosambazwa na wanyama zinasambazwa porini.

sourceString: Particularly, bat CoVs with zoonotic potential are so diverse.
targetString: Hususan, virusi vya CoV vinavyosababishwa na popo vyenye uwezo wa kusambazwa na wanyama ni anuwai mno.

sourceString: There are plenty of opportunities that these zoonotic CoVs evolve and recombine, resulting in the emergence of new CoVs that are more transmissible and/or deadly in humans in future.
targetString: Kuna fursa nyingi ambapo virusi hivi vya CoV vinavyosambazwa na wanyama hukua na kuungana tena, vikisababisha kuibuka kwa virusi vingine vya CoV ambavyo vinasambazwa zaidi na/au ni hatari zaidi kwa binadamu katika siku zijazo.

sourceString: The culture of eating wild animals in some places of China should be abandoned to reduce unnecessary contact between humans and animals.
targetString: Utamaduni wa kula wanyama wa porini katika baadhi ya maeneo nchini China unapaswa kuachwa ili kupunguza utangamano kati ya binadamu na wanyama.

sourceString: With the ordeals of SARS, MERS and COVID-19, a better preparedness and response plan should be in place.
targetString: Kwa sababu ya kuwepo kwa matatizo ya SARS, MERS na COVID-19, hali ya kujitayarisha vyema na mpango wa kukabiliana unapaswa kuwekwa.

sourceString: In fact, many viruses have existed in the planet for a very long time.
targetString: Hakika, virusi vingi vimekuwepo duniani kwa muda mrefu.

sourceString: They stay in their own natural reservoirs until there is a chance for spillover.
targetString: Virusi hivi huishi katika hifadhi zao asilia hadi wakati kuna nafasi ya kusambaa.

sourceString: Although bats have many features that favours the spreading of viruses, the chance for humans to be in contact with bats and other wildlife species can be minimized if people are educated to stay away from them.
targetString: Ingawa popo wana sifa nyingi zinazowezesha kusambaa kwa virusi, nafasi ya binadamu kutangamana na popo na viumbe wengine wa porini inaweza kupunguzwa ikiwa watu wataelimishwa kukaa mbali ya wanyama hao.

sourceString: Continuous surveillance in mammals is necessary for better understanding of the ecology of CoVs and their natural hosts, which will prove useful in preventing animal-to-human transmission and future outbreaks.
targetString: Ni muhimu uchunguzi kuendelea kwa wanyama ili kuelewa vyema ekolojia ya CoV na wabebaji wao asilia, jambo litakalodhihirisha kuwa muhimu katika kuzuia usambazaji kutoka kwa mnyama hadi kwa binadamu na mikurupuko ya siku zijazo.

sourceString: To conclude, the most effective way to prevent viral zoonosis is for humans to stay away from the ecological niches of the natural reservoirs of the zoonotic viruses.
targetString: Kuhitimisha, njia inayofaa zaidi ya kuzuia usambazaji wa virusi kutoka kwa wanyama ni kwa binadamu kukaa mbali na mazingira ya kiekolojia ya wahifadhi asilia wa virusi vinavyosambazwa kutoka kwa wanyama.

sourceString: Several pieces in the puzzle of the zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2 are still missing.
targetString: Bado kuna mambo mengi yasiyojulikana kuhusu chimbuko la SARS-CoV-2 kutoka kwa wanyama.

sourceString: First, if bats transmit an ancestral virus of SARS-CoV-2 to pangolins, it will be of interest to see under what circumstances bats and pangolins could share the same ecological niche.
targetString: Kwanza, ikiwa popo wanasambaza virusi vya kijadi vya SARS-CoV-2 kwa kakakuona, itakuwa jambo la kuvutia kuona ni katika hali zipi ambapo popo na kakakuona wanaweza wakapatikana katika mazingira sawa ya kiekolojia.

sourceString: Second, if bats play a more direct role in human transmission, how humans get into contact with bats should be determined.
targetString: Pili, iwapo popo wana nafasi ya moja kwa moja zaidi katika usambazaji kwa binadamu, inapaswa kubainiwa jinsi binadamu hutangamana na popo.

sourceString: Third, if a third mammal acts as the true intermediate host, how it interacts with the different species including humans, bats and pangolins has to be clarified.
targetString: Tatu, ikiwa mamalia wa tatu atatumika kama mbebaji halisi wa kati, inapaswa kubainishwa jinsi mnyama huyo huingiliana na viumbe wengine ikiwa ni pamoja na binadamu, popo na kakakuona.

sourceString: Finally, since many mammals including domestic animals might be susceptible to SARS-CoV-2, both surveillance and experimental infection should be conducted.
targetString: Hatimaye, kwa kuwa wanyama wengine ikiwa ni pamoja na wanyama wa nyumbani wanaweza kuwa katika hatari ya kupata SARS-CoV-2, maambukizi ya kiuchunguzi na kimajaribio yanapaswa kuendeshwa.

sourceString: Should it be a bat, a pangolin or another mammal, it is expected that SARS-CoV-2 or its parental viruses that are almost identical will be identified in its natural hosts in future.
targetString: Ikiwa ni popo, kakakuona au mnyama mwingine, inatarajiwa kwamba SARS-CoV-2 au virusi vyake vizalishaji ambavyo vinakaribia kufanana vitatambuliwa kwenye wabebaji wake asilia katika siku zijazo.

sourceString: Continued investigations in this area will elucidate the evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, with important implications in the prevention and control of COVID-19 in humans.
targetString: Kuendelea kwa uchunguzi katika uwanja huu kutapambanua njia ya ukuaji wa SARS-CoV-2 katika wanyama, na athari muhimu ikiwa katika uzuiaji na udhibiti wa COVID-19 katika binadamu.

sourceString: Updating the diagnostic criteria of COVID-19 “suspected case” and “confirmed case” is necessary
targetString: Kusasisha utaratibu wa upimaji wa “kisa kinachoshukiwa” na “kisa kilichothibitishwa” cha COVID-19 ni muhimu

sourceString: On 6 February 2020, our team had published a rapid advice guideline for diagnosis and treatment of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infection, and this guideline provided our experience and make well reference for fighting against this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: Mnamo tarehe 6 Februari 2020, timu yetu ilichapisha mwongozo wa ushauri wa haraka wa uchunguzi na matibabu ya maambukizi ya virusi vipya vya korona 2019 (2019-nCoV), na mwongozo ulitoa uzoefu wetu na kuweka marejeleo mema kwa ajili ya kupigana na janga hili kubwa kote duniani.

sourceString: However, the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge are gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: Hata hivyo, ugonjwa wa virusi vya korona 2019 (COVID-19) ni ugonjwa mpya, ufahamu na ujuzi wetu unaendelea kua kulingana na matokeo ya utatifi unaoendelea na uzoefu wa matendo ya kimatibabu; hivyo, mikakakti ya upimaji na matibabu pia inaendelea kusasishwa.

sourceString: In this letter, we answered one comment on our guideline and provided the newest diagnostic criteria of “suspected case” and “confirmed case” according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (seventh version) that issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China.
targetString: Katika barua hii, tulijibu maoni moja kwenye mwongozo wetu na tukatoa utaratibu mpya zaidi wa upimaji wa "kisa kinachoshukiwa" na "kisa klichothibitishwa" kulingana na Miongozo ya hivi punde ya Upimaji na Matibabu ya COVID-19(toleo la saba) iliyotolewa na Kamati ya Kitaifa ya Afya ya Jamhuri ya Watu wa China.

sourceString: In December 2019, the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) has caused an outbreak, which is now officially named as the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the virus has been named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Mnamo Disemba 2019, virusi vipya vya korona vya 2019 (2019-nCoV) vimesababisha mkurupuko, ambao sasa unaitwa rasmi kama ugonjwa wa virusi vya korona 2019 (COVID-19) na virusi vyake vimepewa jina la severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: On 11 March 2020, WHO characterized COVID-19 as a pandemic.
targetString: Mnamo tarehe 11 Machi 2020, WHO iliainisha COVID-19 kuwa ni janga kubwa.

sourceString: In order to fight against the SARS-CoV-2 infection, our team has developed a rapid advice guideline and that has been published online in Military Medical Research on 06 February 2020.
targetString: Ili kupambana na maambukizi ya SARS-CoV-2, timu yetu imeunda mwongozo wa ushauri wa haraka na umechapishwa mtandaoni kwenye Utafiti wa Kimatibabu wa Jeshi tarehe 06 Februari 2020.

sourceString: It has attracted a great attention since published.
targetString: Umevutia umakinifu mkubwa tangu kuchapishwa kwake.

sourceString: Note however that COVID-19 is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge is gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: Hata hivyo, kumbuka kwamba COVID-19 ni ugonjwa mpya, ufahamu na ujuzi wetu unaongezeka kulingana na matokeo ya utafiti unaoendelea na uzoefu wa huduma za kimatibabu, hivyo, mikakati ya uchunguzi na matibabu pia inaendelea kusasishwa.

sourceString: For instance the Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), among 16 January 2020 to 3 March 2020, has issued a total of seven editions with some contexts being substantively changed.
targetString: Kwa mfano, Miongozo ya Upimaji na Matibabu ya COVID-19 iliyotolewa na Kamati ya Kitaifa ya Afya ya Jamhuri ya Watu wa China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), kati ya tarehe 16 Januari 2020 hadi tarehe 3 Machi 2020, imetoa jumla ya matoleo saba huku baadhi ya miktadha ikibadilishwa maudhui.

sourceString: Now our guideline received a comment by Zhou et al., they introduced a simple scoring proposal based on their clinical experience.
targetString: Sasa mwongozo wetu ulipokea maoni kutoka Zhou na wenzake., walileta pendekezo rahisi la kupata alaa kulingana na uzoefu wao wa kimatibabu.

sourceString: Their work added new evidence for our guideline and also make valuable reference for this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: Kazi yao iliongeza ushahidi mpya kwa mwongozo wetu na pia kufanya rejeleo la thamani kwa janga hili kote ulimwenguni.

sourceString: We endorse their significant work and express our thanks.
targetString: Tunapendekeza kazi yao muhimu na kutoa shukrani zetu.

sourceString: However, their work also needs update according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (Trial seventh version) and recently studies.
targetString: Hata hivyo, kazi yao pia inahitaji kusasishwa kulingana na Mwongozo wa hivi punde wa Upimaji na Matibabu wa COVID-19 (Toleo la jaribio la saba) na utafiti wa hivi majuzi.

sourceString: According to the seventh edition (3 March 2020), to confirm the suspected case needs to combine any one item of epidemiological history features with two items of clinical manifestations to make a comprehensive analysis, or needs to meet three items of clinical manifestations if without clear epidemiological history:
targetString: Kulingana na toleo la saba (tarehe 3 Machi 2020), kuthibitisha visa vinavyoshukiwa kunahitaji kujumuisha kipengee chochote kimoja cha vipengele vya historia ya kiepidimiolojia na vipengee viwili vya udhihirishaji wa kimatbabu ili kufanya uchunguzi tondoti au mahitaji ya kukidhi vipengee vitatu vya udhihirisho wa kimatibabu ikiwa hakuna historia wazi ya kiepidimiolojia:

sourceString: Epidemiological history: (1) a history of travel or residence in Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 cases had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (2) a history of contact with SARS-CoV-2 infectious cases (with positive nucleic acid test); (3) a history of contacting with patients with fever or respiratory symptoms from Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (4) a history of contacting with cluster of confirmed cases (≥ 2 cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms occurred within 2 weeks in small areas, such as home, office, class of school, etc).
targetString: Historia ya kiepidimiolojia: (1) historia ya kusafiri au kuishi Jijini Wuhan na maeneo ya karibu au jamii zingine ambapo visa vya COVID-19 vimeripotiwa katika siku 14 zilizopita kabla ya kuanza kwa dalili; (2) historia ya kugusana na visa vya maambukizi ya SARS-CoV-2 (kwa vipimo chanya vya asidi ya nyuklea); (3)historia ya kugusana na wagonjwa walio na dalili za joto jingi au pumu kutoka jiji la Wuhan na maeneo ya karibu au jamii zingine ambapo COVID-19 iliripotiwa katika siku 14 zilizopita kabla ya kuanza kwa dalili; (4) historia ya kugusana na mkusanyiko wa visa viliyothibitishwa (visa 2 au zaidi vya joto jingi mwili na/au dalili za pumu zilizotokea ndani ya wiki 2 katika maeneo madogo, kama vile nyumbani, ofisi, darasa shuleni. n.k).

sourceString: Clinical manifestations: (1) fever and/ or respiratory symptoms; (2) with imaging features of COVID-19 infection; (3) total white blood cell counts showing normal, decreased, or reduced lymphocyte count in the early onset stage.
targetString: Udhihirisho wa kimatibabu: (1) joto jingi mwilini na/au dalili za pumu; (2)sifa zinazoonekana za maambukizi ya COVID-19; (3) idadi ya jumla ya seli nyeupe za damu zinazoonyesha idadi ya kawaida, iliyopungua ya seli nyeupe za damu katika awamu wa mapema.

sourceString: Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in serum test; or a change of the SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase.
targetString: Upimaji wa kisa kilichothibitishwa unapaswa kutegemea kisa kukiwa na kisa kinachoshukiwa chenye kipengee chochote cha ushahidi wa ugnojwa au serolojia ifuatavyo: (1) kupatikaka kwa virusi vya SARS-CoV-2 kwa muda halisi kupitia vipimo vya PCR; (2)msururu mzima wa genome ya virusi unaoonyesha mfanano mkubwa na virusi vipya vya korona vinavyofahamika; (3)kuwepo kwa antibodi mahususi ya IgM na IgG kwa SARS-CoV-2 katika kipimo cha serami; au kubadilika kwa antibodi mahususi ya IgG ya SARS-CoV-2 kutokuwepo hadi kuwepo au kuongezeka kwa mara 4 na zaidi katika awamu ya kupona zaidi ya awamu ya hali mbaya ya ugonjwa.

sourceString: We can see that the real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract or blood samples was added to the second (18 January 2020) and third (22 January 2020) editions.
targetString: Tunaweza kuona kwamba kipimo cha muda halisi cha PCR kwa asidi ya kinyuklia kwenye njia ya kupumua au sampuli ya damu kiliongezwa kwenye toleo la pili la (Tarehe 18 Januari 2020) na la tatu (Tarehe 22 Januari 2020).

sourceString: The pathogenic detection of blood sample was added to the fourth (27 January 2020) and fifth (8 February 2020) editions; and then the serological evidence was added to the seventh edition.
targetString: Ugunduzi wa kipathogeni wa sampuli ya damu uliongezwa kwenye toleo la nne (tarehe 27 januari 2020) na toleo la tano (tarehe 8 Februari 2020); na ushahidi wa kiserolojia uliongezwa kwenye toleo la saba.

sourceString: These modifications based on the researchers continued work that to search for an optimal nucleic acid detection kit for rapid diagnosis, as well as the samples from respiratory tract including blood sampling, which increased the availability of different specimens, and supported bringing the specific antibody positive result into the confirmed criteria.
targetString: Marekebisho haya kulingana na watafiti yaliendeleza kazi ya kutafuta kifurushi bora cha kugundua asidi ya nyuklea kwa ajili ya upimaji haraka, pamoja na sampuli kutoka kwa njia ya pumu ikiwa ni pamoja na sampuli wa damu, ambayo iliongeza upatikanji wa sampuli tofauti na kusaidia kuletwa kwa matokeo chanya ya antibodi mahususi katika utaratibu uliothibitishwa.

sourceString: Besides, there are more and more evidence that remind us to caution with the atypical symptomatic and asymptomatic patients.
targetString: Kando na hayo, kuna ushihidi mwingi zaidi unaotukumbusha kutahadhari na wagonjwa walio na dalili kwa njia isiyo ya kawaida na wale ambao hawana na dalili.

sourceString: Hence, the flow chart of Zhou et al. should be updated, as they classified the person without clinical symptoms as “low risk”.
targetString: Hivyo, chati ya Zhou na wenzake inapaswa kusasishwa, kwa sababu iliainisha mtu bila dalili za kimatibabu kuwa ni wa “hatari ya chini”.

sourceString: The score system also needs to be verified in further clinical practice and studies.
targetString: Mfumo wa alama pia unahitaji kuthibitishwa katika matendo na utafiti wa kimatibabu wa baadaye.

sourceString: To conclude, we hope more direct evidence coming up and call for readers to provide their comments.
targetString: Kukamilisha, tunatumai ushahidi wa moja kwa moja zaidi utaibuka na tunawarai wasomaji kutoa maoni yao.

sourceString: For the diagnosis of “suspected case” and “confirmed case”, we suggest to trace and obey the newest guidelines of their home countries.
targetString: Kwa upimaji wa "kisa kinachoshukiwa" na "kisa kilichothibitishwa", tunapendekeza kufuatwa na utiifu wa miongozo mipya ya nchi zao za nyumbani.

sourceString: Our team will also timely update our guideline to offer help.
targetString: Timu yetu pia itasasisha kwa muda ufaao mwongozo wetu ili kutoa msaada.

sourceString: Bangladesh reports five new deaths due to COVID-19, a daily highest
targetString: Bangladesh iliripoti vifo vipya vya watu watano kutokana na COVID-19, visa vya juu zaidi kuripotiwa kila siku

sourceString: Yesterday, Bangladesh has confirmed five new deaths due to COVID-19 on the day.
targetString: Jana, Bangladesh ilithibitisha vifo vipya vitano kutokana na COVID-19 kwa siku hiyo.

sourceString: This is the highest number of fatalities in a day due to the virus.
targetString: Hii ndiyo idadi ya juu zaidi ya vifo vinavyotokea kwa siku kutokana na virusi.

sourceString: As of yesterday, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) reported the number of recorded infected cases included 114 active cases and 33 recovered cases who were staying home.
targetString: Kufikia jana, Taasisi ya Epidimiolojia ya Bangladesh, Udhibiti wa Magonjwa na Utafiti (IEDCR) iliripoti idadi ya visa vilivyorekodiwa vya maambukizi vilivyojumuisha visa 114 vilivyopo na visa 33 vya watu waliopona waliokuwa wakiishi nyumbani.

sourceString: A total of 17 deaths have been recorded.
targetString: Jumla ya vifo 17 vilirekodiwa.

sourceString: In an online news briefing, the director of IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, said the fatalities included four males and one female.
targetString: Katika taarifa ya habari ya mtandaoni, mkurugenzi wa IEDCR, Dkt Meerjady Sabrina Flora alisema kuwa vifo vilijumuisha wanaume wanne na mwanamke mmoja.

sourceString: According to Dr Meerjady, two cases were aged above 60, two between 51 and 60, and one 41-50 years old.
targetString: Kulingana na Dkt. Meerjady, visa viwili vilikuwa vya watu wenye umri wa zaidi ya miaka 60, wawili kati ya miaka 51 na 60 na mmoja miaka 41-50.

sourceString: She also said two of the victims were from Dhaka.
targetString: Pia alisema wawili kati ya waathiriwa walikuwa wa kutoka Dhaka.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a pandemic on March 11.
targetString: Shirika la Afya Duniani (WHO) lilitangaza COVID-19 kuwa janga kubwa tarehe 11 Machi.

sourceString: A hospital official told Anadolu Agency, a local news outlet, that one of the deceased was Jalal Saifur Rahman, a director of Bengali Anti-Corruption Commission, who was cared for at the Kuwait Maitree Hospital.
targetString: Afisa wa hospitali aliliambia Shirika la Anadolu, shirika la habari la ndani kwamba mmoja wa waliopoteza maisha yao alikuwa Jalal Saifur Rahman, mkurugenzi katika Tume ya Kupambana na Ufisadi nchini Bengani, ambaye alitibiwa katika Hospitali ya Kuwait Maitree.

sourceString: On Saturday, in an online video announcement, Bangladeshi Road Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader said public transport would be shut down for longer than initially planned, until this coming Saturday.
targetString: Siku ya Jumamosi, katika tangazo la video mtandaoni, Waziri wa Uchukuzi wa Bangladesh Obaidul Quader alisema usafiri wa umma ungefungwa kwa muda zaidi ya ilivypangwa awali, hadi Jumamosi hii ijayo.

sourceString: This public transport shutdown had initially started on March 26 and was planned to end on Saturday, April 4.
targetString: Kufungwa kwa usafiri huu wa umma kulikuwa kumeanza awali mnamo 26 Machi na ulipangwa kuisha mnamo Jumamosi, tarehe 4.

sourceString: Transport of essential goods -- medical, fuel and food -- was still allowed.
targetString: Usafirishaji wa bidhaa muhimu -- za kimatibabu, fueli na vyakula -- bado uliruhusiwa.

sourceString: The first recorded incidents of COVID-19 infection in Bangladesh were on March 8, in two people who returned from Italy and also the wife of one of them.
targetString: Matukio ya kwanza ya maambukizi ya COVID-19 nchini Bangladesh yalikuwa tarehe 8 Machi, kwa watu wawili ambao walirejea kutoka Italia na pia mke wa mmoja wao.

sourceString: As of March 19, these three had already recovered.
targetString: Kufikia tarehe 19 Machi, watu hawa watatu hawa tayari walikuwa wamepona.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 surpasses one million infections worldwide
targetString: Virusi vya SARS-CoV-2 vinazidi maambukizi milioni moja kote ulimwenguni

sourceString: On Thursday, the total number of cases of the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus infections surpassed one million worldwide, Johns Hopkins University data indicated.
targetString: Siku ya Alhamisi, jumla ya idadi ya visa vya maambukizi ya virusi vya korona SARS-CoV-2 ilipita milioni moja kote ulimwenguni, data kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Johns Hopkins ilionyesha hivyo.

sourceString: At least 52 thousand deaths were linked to COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus.
targetString: Angalau vifo elfu 52 vilihusishwa na COVID-19, ugonjwa unaosababishwa na virusi vya korona.

sourceString: The milestone came the same day Malawi confirmed its first coronavirus infections and Zambia had its first coronavirus-related death.
targetString: Upeo huu ulifikiwa siku hiyo hiyo ambapo nchi ya Malawi ilithibitisha maambukizi yake ya kwanza ya visa vya korona na Zambia ilithibitisha kifo cha kwanza kilichohusiana na virusi vya korona.

sourceString: North Korea claimed, as of Thursday, it was one of the few countries remaining free of coronavirus infections.
targetString: Korea Kaskazini ilitangaza, kufikia Alhamisi, kuwa ilikuwa mojawapo ya nchi chache ambazo hazikuwa na maambukizi ya virusi vya korona.

sourceString: By yesterday, the World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases, including 79,332 cases in the twenty four hours preceding 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4.
targetString: Kufikia jana, Shirika la Afya Duniani liliripoti visa 1,051,635 vilivyothibitishwa, ikiwa ni pamoja na visa 79,332 katika saa ishirini na nne kabla ya 10 asubuhi, Saa za Ulaya ya Kati (0800 UTC) mnamo tarehe 4 Aprili.

sourceString: In the United States, over 244 thousand coronavirus cases were recorded, linking to at least 5,900 deaths.
targetString: Nchini Marekani, zaidi ya visa elfu 244 vya virusi vya korona vilirekodiwa, vikiunganisha angalua vifo 5,900.

sourceString: CBS News reported, citing Johns Hopkins University data, there were over 1,000 US deaths on Wednesday caused by coronavirus infections.
targetString: CBS News iliripoti, ikitaja data ya Chuo Kikuu cha Johns Hopkins, kulikuwa na zaidi ya vifo 1,000 nchini Marekani siku ya Jumatano vilivyosababishwa na maambukizi virusi vya korona.

sourceString: Around the world, countries announced stricter measures to inhibit the disease from spreading.
targetString: Kote duniani, nchi mbalimbali zilitangaza hatua madhubuti zaidi ili kuzuia ugonjwa huu kuenea.

sourceString: On Thursday, Sergei Sobyanin, the mayor of Moscow, extended the city lockdown to May 1.
targetString: Siku ya Alhamisi, Sergei Sobyanin, meya wa Moscow, aliendelezwa kufungwa kwa shughuli za jiji hadi tarehe 1 Mei.

sourceString: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin declared Russians would continue to be paid without going to work until April 30.
targetString: Kitaifa, Rais Vladimir Putin alitangaza kwamba Wananchi wa Urusi wataendelea kulipwa bila kuenda kazini hadi tarehe 30 Aprili.

sourceString: The parliament of Portugal voted to extend the national state of emergency by 15 days; the vote passed with 215 votes in favor, ten abstentions, and one vote against.
targetString: Bunge la Ureno lilipiga kura ili kuongeza hali ya dharura ya kitaifa kwa siku 15; kura hiyo ilipita kwa kura 215 za uungwaji mkono, kumi za wabunge waliochagua kutoshiriki kura na kura moja ya aliyepinga.

sourceString: Saudi Arabia extended curfews in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina to last the entire day; previously, the curfew was only in effect between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.
targetString: Saudi Arabia iliongeza siku ya kafyu katika miji mitakatifu ya Mecca na Medinaili kuendelea kwa siku nzima; awali, muda wa kafyu ulikuwa kati ya saa 3 jioni na 6 asubuhi.

sourceString: Thailand planned to implement a curfew between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.
targetString: Thailand ilipanga kutekeleza kafyu kati ya saa 10 jioni na 4 asubuhi.

sourceString: The governor of Ohio, Mike DeWine, announced the state had extended its stay-at-home order until May 1.
targetString: Gavana wa Ohio, Mike DeWine alitangaza kuwa jimbo hilo liliongeza muda wa agizo la watu kukaa nyumbani hadi tarehe 1 Mei.

sourceString: Stores in Australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction
targetString: Maduka nchini Australia yalipunguza idadi ya karatasi shashi ambazo mtu angeweza kununua

sourceString: On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively.
targetString: Jioni ya siku za Jumapili na Jumamosi, maduka makubwa ya Australia ya Woolworths na Coles yalipunguza vikomo vyao vya ununuzi wa karatasi shashi hadi vifurishi viwili na kimoja mtawalia kwa kila muamala katika maduka yote katika ngazi ya kitaifa.

sourceString: ALDI also introduced a one-pack limit, on Monday.
targetString: ALDI pia ilizindua kikomo cha kifurushi kimoja, siku ya Jumatatu.

sourceString: These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' Facebook pages.
targetString: Vikomo hivi vilichapishwa kama ujumbe katika maeneo ya malipo na kwenye kurasa za Facebook za maduka.

sourceString: Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate.
targetString: Wanunuzi waliripotiwa kununua bidhaa kwa wingi kutokana na hofu ya COVID-19 endapo watu wanahitaji kujitenga.
